statements: DELETE FROM GenderPayGapData WHERE industry = 'Tech' AND region = 'California';
DELETE FROM GenderPayGapData WHERE region = 'East' AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM gender_pay_gap_by_region WHERE region_name = 'West Coast';
DELETE FROM gender_pay_gap_by_region WHERE region_name = 'North' AND median_male_salary > 50000
DELETE FROM industry_pay_gap_data WHERE industry_id IN (3, 4);
DELETE FROM gender_pay_gap_by_region WHERE region_id = 1 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM employee_data WHERE gender='Male' AND salary > 50000;
DELETE FROM advocacy_efforts WHERE budget < 10000 AND target_gender='Female';
